--- title: "" pagetitle: "Yanhao Wang" ---
Yanhao Wang

Welcome to my website! I am an Assistant Professor of Business Economics at the Alberta School of Business, University of Alberta. I received my Ph.D. from the Kelley School of Business, Indiana University. I work on topics in health care, household finance, and industrial organization.
[](files/cv/cv.pdf)

### Selected Working Projects - [Does Physicians' Financial Health Affect Medical Treatment and Patient Outcomes?](files/paper/Physician Financial Health_Yanhao Wang_Nov 2025.pdf)
revise \& resubmit, *American Economic Journal: Economic Policy* - [Race-Specific Provider Performance: Evidence from Black Lives Matter Protests](files/paper/Hospital Performance BLM_Lin_Wang_Xiang_Dec 2025.pdf)
with Haizhen Lin and Jia Xiang (*this draft: Dec 2025*) - [Agreeing to Disagree: Political Partisanship and Team Performance in Healthcare]()
with Haizhen Lin and Jia Xiang (*draft available upon request*) ### Publications - [The Value of Group Purchasing: Evidence from the U.S. Hospital Industry](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jpubeco.2025.105380)
with Haizhen Lin, *Journal of Public Economics (2025)* - [Competition and Countervailing Power: Evidence from China Eastern and Shanghai Airlines Merger](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jairtraman.2020.101990)
with Chun-Yu Ho and Patrick McCarthy, *Journal of Air Transport Management (2021)* - [Decomposing Sources of Gain from Airline Mergers: A Model and Case Study from China](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.retrec.2020.100996)
with Chun-Yu Ho and Patrick McCarthy, *Research in Transportation Economics (2020)*
